content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Ore Mine at position(-17.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (-17.0, -50.0)) 
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0))
-  Transport belt group connecting the drills to the rest of the factory

### Furnace at position(-10.0, -49.0)
Consists of 
-  Stone furnace at position (-10.0, -49.0)

### Inserter and Transport Belt System
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter (position (-13.5, -50.5)) that picks up items from the transport belt
-  Burner inserter (position (-13.5, -48.5)) that drops items into the furnace or other parts of the factory
-  Transport belt group that connects the furnace to the rest of the factory
-  Transport belt group that connects the inserter to the rest of the factory

### Chest at position(-16.5, -47.5)
Consists of 
-  Wooden chest at position (-16.5, -47.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drills
-  Make sure to provide fuel to the burner mining drills to avoid "out of fuel" warnings
-  Ensure that there is a sink entity in place to accept the output of the mining drills to avoid "output blocked by item on the ground" warnings

### Errors when using furnaces
-  Make sure to provide ingredients to the furnace to avoid "no ingredients to smelt" warnings

### Errors when using inserters
-  Make sure to provide source items to the inserter to avoid "inserter waiting for source items" warnings

### NAMESPACE
*   No utility functions have been defined or invoked.
*   Important variables:
    *   `wooden-chest`: 2
    *   `transport-belt`: 7
    *   `burner-mining-drill`: 1
    *   `stone-furnace`: 1
    *   `iron-ore`: 1100
    *   `iron-plate`: 168
